meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving multiple stages.
meanings.sent1: The multistages rocket was designed to reach different heights at various points.
meanings.sent2: The project required a multistages approach to ensure each step was completed successfully.
meanings.sent3: The multistages puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her multistages plan for the party ensured everything ran smoothly from start to finish.
meanings.sent5: The multistages performance showcased the dancers' skills at different levels.

meanings.definition: A series of stages or steps in a process or system.
meanings.sent1: The multistages of the factory production line ensured efficiency in manufacturing.
meanings.sent2: The multistages of the project required careful planning and coordination.
meanings.sent3: The multistages of the video game led to an unexpected twist in the storyline.
meanings.sent4: The multistages of life can be compared to chapters in a book, each bringing new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The multistages of the race challenged the athletes to push themselves at every level.
